about_the_game:
From the far reaching void of space, to the very cores of planets. This is where Phenomena Embattled takes place. You are part of an alien confederation sent to earth to find the means of ending an intergalactic conflict. Humanity is caught between alien star-fleets. They must strive to keep their place in the universe. You must find the path to complete your mission.

The game is a physics based shoot 'em up. Interact with squadrons and entire fleets in a story driven world. This single player narrative focuses on action rich, rouge-like, trans-medium combat. Be it air, water, or vacuum. The medium you steer your unexplained vehicle through will determine your capabilities. And the ones of your enemies.

Features:

  • Physics based interactive environment

  • Action driven missions and story

  • Intelligent enemies

  • Formation flying

  • Ability leveling

  • Choose your unexplained phenomenon

  • 60+ base units to fight with and against

  • Many unique undisclosed encounters

  • Underground bases

  • Worlds beyond the solar system

Early Access:

The game is currently in development. The demo offers introductory content which we are improving and expanding. Join, subscribe and follow our social channels for updates and news.

Squadrons stick together and try to out-maneuver you as a fleet. Choose your attack vector wisely: the squadron you are engaging might set you up for the backup fleet.

The Inhabitants of earth are dangerously close to discovering the true energies held within the planet.

Earth is ancient. And so are the civilizations that know about it. Uncover their past doings, venture deep underground and set their power free again.

The fate of Earth awaits your flying skill.

content_descriptors.notes: Excessive depictions of explosions and destruction. Depictions of killing and death.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 23.10 64-bit Operating System
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 6100 or AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GT 730 4GB or AMD Radeon RX 550 4GB
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DX11 compatible

  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce RTX 4060 8GB or AMD RX 7600 8GB
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DX11 compatible
